definitions: A country in Western Asia located at the eastern end of the Arabian Peninsula.
A federation of seven emirates: Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain, Fujairah, and Ras Al Khaimah.
examples: The UAE is known for its modern architecture.
Many expatriates live and work in the UAE.
Tourism is a significant industry in the UAE.
